content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Smelting Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently have no fuel or ingredients but contain some copper plate output

### Copper Cable Production Line (around position 7.5-12.5, 9.5-11.5)
Consists of:
- Small electric pole at (7.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 10.5) facing DOWN
- Input wooden chest at (7.5, 11.5) containing copper plates and cables
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) configured for copper cable production
- Output burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) facing RIGHT
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing iron plates, copper cables and electronic circuits

### Storage Area (around position 14.5-16.5, 11.5)
Consists of two wooden chests:
- Chest at (14.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5, 11.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System (around position -9.5 to -3.5, 22.5-24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-3.5, 24.5)
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 22.5)

### Science Pack System (around position 0.5, 28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) facing UP
- Wooden chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

### Electricity Distribution
Network of electric poles connecting power generation to consumers, with voltage of 35100

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to target location before attempting to place entities
- Maximum placement distance is 10 units from player position

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if target position is clear before attempting to place entities
- Remove existing entities if they are incorrectly placed

### Resource management errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to fuel burner inserters
- Harvest more coal when running low to maintain power system operation

### Entity alignment issues
- Multiple instances of misaligned inserters being placed and removed
- Pay attention to inserter pickup and drop positions when placing
- Consider using preview functionality to verify inserter alignment before placement
